alert.note: Alert for Sebastian (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 16 at 2:20AM CDT until April 16 at 3:15AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Sebastian County in west central Arkansas... Northeastern Haskell County in southeastern Oklahoma... Southeastern Sequoyah County in east central Oklahoma... Northeastern Le Flore County in southeastern Oklahoma... * Until 315 AM CDT. * At 220 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles southwest of Gans, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations in or near the path include... Fort Smith... Pocola... Spiro... Arkoma... Hackett... Bonanza... Gans... Rock Island... Cowlington... Scullyville... Braden... Rye Hill... Jenson... Cottonwood... This includes Interstate 540 between mile markers 12 and 14. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
